::FireBlade::
FireBlade's arm was caught by the amazing speed of IR's tail.  As the
acid shot out however he yanked his arm in front of him the tail
wrapped around it into the path of the acid so that if it hit anything
it would be it's own tail.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
>
> * Feeling the arm unlink from FireBlades body, Iron Raptor did a
surprising
> thing.  She tilted her head back and swollowed what was left of the
arm,
> whole.
> Trickles of FireBlades mech fluid slopped down to her chin and
dripped from
> it as she licked her teeth, looking down at the enemy.
> Her eyes narrowed into slits as she saw FireBlade get into a defensive
> stance, one arm less.
> She chuckled and it boomed out over the battle field, then leaning
down so
> that she would be face to face with him.*
>
> " No. You are MINE, warrior!"
>
> * Iron Raptor reared back onto her hind legs.*
>
> " Built to take the strains of war, and to devour my enemies."
>
> * She then swooped down to curl her body around FireBlade, her tail
whipping
> around to wrap around the arm that still held his sword.*
>
> " And just as I took your arm, the rest of you will meet the same fate!"
>
> * Her jaws opened wide and a wave of acid was spat towards
FireBlade, though
> he had no where to run this time.*
>
>
>
>
>
>
